name: Beaver Blast
description:
Blast off through the forest chomping on wood while you fly through the sky. Be careful if you don't time your chomps correctly, the bark on those trees can be worse than your bite.

Use your collected wood to upgrade your cannon, your gliders, and your bounce ability before you head once more into the forest.

Develop for TOJam 2021: Feels like a Re-run with the theme: "Once More, With Feeling!"

Controls:

  • Mouse - Aim Cannon
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire Cannon / Chomp
  • Right Mouse Button - Downward Dash and Bounce

Credits:

  • Phuc Tran
  • Debbie Chan
  • Jason Wilson
  • Justin Flowers
  • Desiree Moffat

A team from Game Hive
